alert.note: Alert for Steuben (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 7:02PM EST until February 22 at 10:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wintry mix with icing/freezing rain, winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Indiana, Steuben County. In Ohio, Williams and Fulton OH Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Icing may cause tree limbs/branches to break, power outages will also be possible due to icing. Road surfaces could see some ice accumulation, however at this time the ground has been warm enough to keep roads ice free, but some surfaces could see icy conditions making travel hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
